meanings.definition: A group of proteins that help maintain the structure of muscle cells.
meanings.sent1: Dystrophins support the shape of muscle cells.
meanings.sent2: The dystrophins are important for keeping muscle cells strong.
meanings.sent3: The dystrophins had a meeting to discuss gym memberships for the muscle cells.
meanings.sent4: Like architects, dystrophins blueprint the muscle cell structure.
meanings.sent5: Without dystrophins, muscle cells would be like a building without beams.

meanings.definition: Proteins that are essential for muscle function.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need dystrophins to perform well.
meanings.sent3: The dystrophins threw a party to celebrate their importance in muscle function.
meanings.sent4: Dystrophins are the engine that drives muscle performance.
meanings.sent5: Imagine dystrophins as the fuel that powers muscle movements.

meanings.definition: Proteins that play a crucial role in muscle health.
meanings.sent1: Dystrophins are vital for maintaining muscle health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study dystrophins to understand muscle well-being.
meanings.sent3: The dystrophins organized a health fair for the muscle community.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of muscle health, dystrophins are the conductors.
meanings.sent5: Healthy muscles owe their condition to the diligent work of dystrophins.
